import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FetchSessionData=_ref=>{let{onSessionData}=_ref;const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);// Manage the loading state
const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Manage error messages
useEffect(()=>{// Check if the onSessionData prop is a valid function
if(typeof onSessionData!=='function'){console.error('onSessionData prop is required and must be a function.');return;}// Fetch session data from the backend
const fetchData=async()=>{try{console.log('Fetching session data...');const response=await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/get-session-id/',{credentials:'include'// Include authentication credentials
});if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`Failed to fetch session data: ${response.status}`);}const data=await response.json();// Parse JSON response
if(!data||!data.id){throw new Error(`Session ID is missing in the response. Data: ${JSON.stringify(data)}`);}console.log('Fetched session data:',data);// Pass the fetched data to the parent component
onSessionData(data);// Reset error if previously set
setError(null);}catch(err){let errorMessage='An unknown error occurred.';// Format the error message
if(err instanceof Error){errorMessage=err.message;}else if(typeof err==='string'){errorMessage=err;}else if(err&&typeof err==='object'){errorMessage=err.error||JSON.stringify(err);}console.error('Error fetching session data:',errorMessage);setError(errorMessage);}finally{// Stop the loading state
setLoading(false);}};// Call the fetchData function
fetchData();},[onSessionData]);// Render loading state
if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading session data..."});}// Render error state
if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{color:'red',padding:'10px',border:'1px solid red'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.location.reload(),children:"Retry"})]});}// Return null because this component's primary purpose is to fetch data
return null;};export default FetchSessionData;
